doc:
Fernand Rivers https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fernand_Rivers 0 Fernand Rivers (born François Large, 6 September 1879, Saint-Lager - 12 September 1960) was a French actor, screenwriter, film producer and director. He was the brother of the actor Rivers Cadet. Fernand_Rivers ( born François_Large , 6_September_1879 , Saint-Lager - 12_September_1960 ) was a_French_actor , screenwriter , film_producer_and_director . He was the_brother of the_actor_Rivers_Cadet .
